translation.USAGE: Please ceate a poll using the following format: /poll Poll Name | Option 1 | Option2 | ... | OptionN.
translation.ERROR_CREATING: There was an error creating your poll: {{error}}
translation.PREVIOUS_VOTE_REPLACED: Your previous vote for **_{{optionData.label}}_** has been replaced.
translation.VOTE_RECORDED: Your vote for **_{{optionData.label}}_** has been recorded.
translation.ERROR_VOTING: Your vote could not be recorded. {{error}}
translation.POLL_END_PERMISSION: Only the poll creator can close a poll. Please ask @{{createdByUsername}} to close it.
translation.ERROR_ENDING: Unable to close the poll. {{ error }}
translation.POLL_COUNT_PERMISSION: Only the poll creator can get the vote count. Please ask @{{createdByUsername}} if you need the count.
translation.ERROR_COUNTING: Unable to get vote count for poll. {{error}}
